00010 namespace cupp {

00022 template <typename T>
00023 class memory1d {
00024         private: /***  INTERNAL DATA  ***/
00025                 const T* pointer_;
00026                 const std::size_t size_;
00027                 
00028         private: /***  CONSTRUCTORS & DESTRUCTORS ***/
00029                 memory1d() {};
00030                 memory1d(const T* pointer, const std::size_t size) :
00031                         pointer_(pointer), size_(size) {}
00032         public:
00039                 memory1d(const memory1D &copy) : pointer_(copy.pointer_), size_(copy.size_) {}
00040 
00041         public:
00042                 
00046                 #if defined(__CUDACC__)
00047                 __host__ __device__
00048                 #endif
00049                 std::size_t size() const {
00050                         return size_;
00051                 }
00052 
00053         public: /***  GPU FUNCTIONS  ***/
00054         #if defined(__CUDACC__)
00055 
00059                 __device__
00060                 operator T*() const {
00061                         return pointer_;
00062                 }
00063         #endif // defined(__CUDACC__)
00064 
00065         friend cupp::device;
00066 }; // class memory1d
00067 
00068 } // namespace cupp

00070 #endif
